All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
DerelictController
this class handles the SegmentController loaded event and checks if it is a derelict station.
EntityLoadedEvent
Eventclass for new loaded segment controllers.
EntityLoadEventLoop
a loop detecting newly loaded segment controllers stores all currently loaded entities and on the next check compares if new ones were added or old ones unloaded.
EntityUnloadedEvent
event that fires whenever a segmentcontroller is unloaded event is not instant, bc its fired from a 1 second loop
EntityWrapper
data container wrapper for segment controller used because segment controllers get destroyed when unloaded: survives unloading of the segmentcontroller
LootConfigReader
Class that contains methods to read a .properties configfile where block item IDs and their weights for spawning in storages are defined.
LootController
Collection of methods used for creating lists of loot which are put into entities inventories.
LootItem
STARMADE MOD CREATOR: Max1M DATE: 23.09.2020 TIME: 01:01 Data container for a block item and its probabilty values range is used for a pointer to get items based on their weight.
LoreHandler
this class reads the lore config files and turns them into LoreShort class instances it saves all of these instances to a list it can be called from outside, takes in specifications for the type of lore you want and returns the fitting loreshort every time a new loreshort is requested, the config file is read again: allows for chaning of config during runtime.
LoreShort
data container for lore short texts read from config file Lists the allowed factions for this text Lists the allowed entity types for this text
Mod
core class of the complete mod.
ServerCheck
Detects once the server or client has finished loading.
